net.java.jddac.jmdi.service
Class BasePort

java.lang.Object
  net.java.jddac.common.fblock.Entity
      net.java.jddac.jmdi.service.Service
          net.java.jddac.jmdi.service.BasePort
All Implemented Interfaces:
ConfigurationInterface
Direct Known Subclasses:
PublisherPort
public class BasePort
extends Service

The BasePort base class is the root for the class hierarchy of all communication Port Objects used to send communications via the underlying communication network.
